user.description: This component will automatically detect and monitor all add-ons whose slug ends with '{addon_suffix}' on your Home Assistant host. No additional configuration is needed.

discovery_confirm.description: Home Assistant has detected the add-on '{addon_slug}'. Do you want to configure this detection for SRAT Companion?
discovery_confirm.title: SRAT Add-on Discovered

addon_not_started.title: Add-on '{addon_slug}' not running
addon_not_started.description: The add-on '{addon_slug}' is installed but has not been running for more than {time_threshold}. This might indicate a problem.

confirm_start.title: Start Add-on '{addon_slug}'
confirm_start.description: Do you want to start the add-on '{addon_slug}'? This action will attempt to start the add-on via the Home Assistant Supervisor.

success.description: The add-on '{addon_slug}' has been successfully started.
success.title: Add-on Started

error.failed_to_start: Failed to start the add-on. Check Supervisor logs for more details.
